experience using modern javascript libraries and frameworks such as react and vue ability to build secure web applications that protect against common attack vectors knowledge of software development overview are you a seasoned web developer who “gets” analytics… and thrives on delivering critical data input to a team that will immediately apply them to drive our business forward. we’re the biggest investment newsletter business in asia… and we went from zero in revenues one year… to $18 million the next… and we’re just getting started. if you join us you’ll be just the tenth employee in a no bureaucracy environment. we want you to help us to drive our growth in 2018. stansberry churchouse research an agora company that’s part of stansberry research is looking for a web developer to help maintain and manage a suite of third party applications to be based in baltimore. want to work for one of baltimore’s best workplaces several of the agora companies have been recognized over the years by the baltimore sun as top workplaces. responsibilities we’re looking for someone to help us to… provide support for a range of proprietary and third party analytical tools and services along with some third party applications. provide support for technical setups or custom customer queries within our crm. troubleshoot and maintain portfolio of websites with front end and back end support. identify areas of concern with web properties and provide solutions. work with developers and content producers to ensure websites are optimized for security speed and accessibility. assist with network systems domains dns records servers . the sort of person we want to hire… can work on tight deadlines and in a high paced global work environment. eagerly takes and applies direction and constructive feedback. is anxious to develop about new ways to deliver powerful business realigning analytics. can easily adapt to shifting demands and needs. qualifications we need someone with 2 4 years of web development experience experience with gtm goolge analytics and webmaster tools a solid understanding of php previous cms experience theme and plugin development html5 css jquery experience with sass and task runners gulp javascript experience angular 4 5 preferred working in a lamp environment version control experience an understanding of git previous experience with aws is a plus previous experience with salesforce a plus excellent written and verbal communication skills to apply please submit your resume and a cover letter to link provided telling us why you’re the best candidate on earth for this position… and tell us anything else you think we should know. include examples of your best work with details about the results they’ve generated. about stansberry churchouse publishing we’re taking the mystery out of finance and investing so that you are empowered and informed to make your own investment decisions. our aim is to help people just like you who are tired of the market noise and who are ready to build true wealth now. we can help you stay away from investments that will hurt you and find the ones that will grow your portfolio – so that you can educate your kids take care of your family and live the life you’ve always wanted. we live in a world with too much information and not enough solutions. and this problem is compounded by too many people who are eager to help you invest your money in a way that will line their pockets instead of yours. we’re independent analysts and writers who cut through the hype of the mainstream financial media and self serving private bankers to give you real insiders’ insight. we have no hidden agenda. we’ll never try to sell you a brokerage account or insurance product. we don’t want to manage your money. we think that the best person to make decisions about your money is you… an informed and educated you.

“good technicians” who can succeed in our environment is absolutely critical. so when we say “fit ” what does that mean to us to “fit” at workwave you must be customer centric you have a strong desire to understand and empathize with customers spending time to truly understand their concerns to ensure that our products and services improve their business performance intellectually curious and passionate you love figuring out what the problem is and finding a way to fix it. you enjoy coming to work each day and have a positive energy that the organization can see and feel. get things done summary: we're looking for a junior fe engineer to help us build web sites and applications for some of the world's major brands. you will write code work closely with our senior engineers and architects and learn how to be a better engineer. you will also get to work with one drupal's core maintainers catch. we sponsor him to work on drupal core. we are a top five ranked drupal agency in the world. we don't just do drupal. we work with lots of open source tools like compass sass wordpress magento silex laravel react node.js and laravel. we love clean code front end performance pull requests and tasty craft beer. hundreds of millions yes seriously of people use the projects we work on every month and everyone in your family will know the clients we work on. a recent tag project was to rebuild mint.com on drupal. please no staffing agencies or contractors. you must be located in the boston. perks fridge stocked with craft beer snacks coffee tea and other drinks cool office space in dtx a block from the red line we will pay for you to get acquia drupal certified free mbta pass 100% employer paid health insurance 401k skills & requirements smart eligible to work in the us you don't mind talking to people three years minimum experience with wordpress drupal ability to work as part of a team experience with git & drush about third & grove third and grove is a digital agency located in san francisco and boston. we help organizations innovate by building amazing technology. we are a fast growing services start up. we believe in git building things the right way coding standards and pushing ourselves to be better engineers producers and all out innovators. we are one of the few agencies that know how to manage a technology project our founder literally wrote on the book on it . that means you work on fully baked requirements are part of the estimate process and aren’t blamed for late projects with unrealistic schedules.

at wellthy we dream of the day when taking care of the sick and the elderly becomes seamlessly human and tech powered. wellthy is evolving the way we take care of each other. we are building a better healthcare experience for people with complex chronic and aging family members. as a senior full stack web developer you will have a large impact on the product. joining us at this stage will offer you the opportunity to grow with the company. you will report to the cto and partner closely with the rest of our product team to scope and run full projects to deliver new features for the wellthy platform. in the first three months at wellthy you will own entire projects from start to finish see your code go into production on a daily basis gain experience at all levels of our stack help scale and evolve the wellthy platform as the company grows make a strong contribution to the company culture and leadership team who we’re looking for you are an experienced developer who has built and maintained a large scale responsive web app using django and react . like everyone you have your favorite technologies but you’re not dogmatic about them. in fact you enjoy learning new technologies on a regular basis. you derive satisfaction not just from clean code and creative solutions but from producing a genuinely useful product that improves the lives of others. you’re proud of the code you write and more importantly the products you create. you are comfortable running with a project on your own but enjoy collaborating with talented and thoughtful colleagues. you realize life is short and that what you build and who you build it with matters. benefits perks health dental and eye insurance coverage relaxed vacation policy 2 weeks min. per year encouraged macbook pro and any other office setup desired i.e. 4k monitor free snacks happy hours and weekly team lunch twice weekly boot camp classes and of course covered access to wellthy for your own family's care coordination needs about wellthy wellthy is a healthcare coordination service. we use dedicated care coordinators and our seamless technology platform to project manage healthcare for families with sick and aging loved ones. wellthy takes the pain out of healthcare – scheduling appointments finding the right specialists researching treatment options managing insurance organizing records communicating with family members and much more. we add a layer of much needed customer service to the health system – giving families help hope and peace of mind. get the care you and your loved ones deserve. with a wellthy care coordinator you'll always have someone on your side. find out more https wellthy.com

job description we’re looking for a front end web developer who can design and implement new and our existing social b2b marketplace dynamic scalable web application s using web development best practices and processes. the front end web developer will adopt embrace and promote agile test driven practices with the team. we’re looking for someone who values team excellence and has a passion for quality and writing clean solid readable and reusable code that scales and performs well. the candidate should be able to take on difficult technical challenges and be comfortable working in a small fast paced agile environment. responsibilities interact with cross functional teams both internal and external in analyzing and translating the functional requirements into technical solutions and specifications. participate in the architectural discussions and provide technical insights into user experience design decisions to maintain consistency across multiple product platforms. develop web applications user interfaces data visualizations and reports that interface various backend systems and services. research debug and provide bug fixes for new releases and production issues. create and maintain documentation diligently for ux ui design standards technical topics processes and all code changes. requirements a bachelor’s degree in computer science or related discipline. 7+ years of experience in software development specifically front end ui web application development using javascript html5 css3 rest json etc. experience with modern javascript frameworks like backbone.js vue.js etc. experience with general ui template libraries like handlebars mustache etc. experience and understanding of ajax object oriented javascript dom and xml. knowledge of problems and solutions for cross browser compatibility knowledge of techniques for improving performance of the web pages using html js and css optimization ability to code according to varying levels of specifications created by ui designers in order to create mock ups prototypes and final product ability to work in highly interactive design cycles experience building products for fast growing web or mobile products a solid foundation in computer science with strong competencies in data structures algorithms and software design. comfortable in a small intense and high growth start up environment. preferred must be team player with solid communication skills strong time management creative analytical problem solving skills and attention to detail working individually and in small teams. experience building mobile & large scale web based e commerce applications. proficiency with php node js framework. proficiency with cloud computing concepts and developing with amazon aws. experience using messaging queues such as rabbitmq. experience using atlassian toolset jira confluence bitbucket . compensation competitive salary and stock options based on experience. comprehensive health insurance including medical dental and vision plans. retirement plan 401k. flexible workplaces and work hours. flexible pto. health initiative that includes on site gym. about balluun is a growing software as a service saas start up company in the exciting and expanding b2b social commerce space. balluun launches industry specific social marketplaces where b2b wholesale sellers and buyers can discover connect and engage with each other to grow and expand their business while conducting all transactions securely on an industry relevant social commerce platform. balluun’s multi tenant cloud architecture enables partners to easily and cost effectively create and scale their digital marketplaces with a fully integrated social experience to deliver b2b e commerce 24 7 365.

collaborating with design team members on prototyping and user testing; understanding business and policy needs and helping translate those needs to a technology solution; working with rest application processing interfaces apis and web services; project management including developing and maintaining project plans and other documents managing and coordinating project elements reviewing agency and interagency work products and ensuring efficient progress on implementation; coordinating development efforts with internal and vendor teams; and identification and assessment of operational improvement opportunities. minimum qual requirements professional vendor certification education and experience requirements you must have current professional vendor certifications. in addition you must have one of the following 1. a masters degree in computer science or a related field from an accredited college or university accredited by regional national professional or specialized agencies recognized as accrediting bodies by the u.s. secretary of education and by the council for higher education accreditation chea and 12 months of satisfactory full time not classroom based specialized experience in computer applications development planning design configuration installation troubleshooting integration performance monitoring maintenance enhancement and security management as described in the following nine major task groups in the it titles task inventory applications development; web development design and maintenance; business systems analysis; project management support; application design; gis structures spatial analysis and mapping principles; testing; technical writing; and version control; or 2. a baccalaureate degree from an accredited college or university accredited by regional national professional or specialized agencies recognized as accrediting bodies by the u.s. secretary of education and by the council for higher education accreditation chea and 24 months of satisfactory full time not classroom based specialized experience as described in 1 above; or 3. a four year high school diploma or its educational equivalent approved by a state s department of education or a recognized accrediting organization and 24 months of satisfactory full time not classroom based specialized experience as described in 1 above plus 48 months of information technology experience as described in the it task inventory ; or 4. a satisfactory combination of education and experience which is equivalent to 3 above. education may be substituted for the information technology experience on the basis of 30 semester credits from an accredited college or university accredited by regional national professional or specialized agencies recognized as accrediting bodies by the u.s. secretary of education and by the council for higher education accreditation chea is equivalent to 12 months of experience up to a maximum of 48 months. however if you qualify under options 2 3 or 4 you must have at least a four year high school diploma or its educational equivalent approved by a state s department of education or a recognized accrediting organization and at least 24 months of satisfactory full time not classroom based specialized information technology experience as described in 1 above. preferred skills the selected candidate must have strong supervisory and development skills and the ability to transform complex requirements to applications that are human centered and easy to navigate as well as display an ability to communicate and work in a team setting. preference will be given to candidates with experience with the following at least three 3 years with hands on experience working with .net technologies c# asp.net mvc webforms webapi wcf services windows services linq asynchronous multithreaded programming visual studio.net 2015 team foundation services ; ajax html 5 css and javascript along with frameworks such as jquery bootstrap and or angularjs; microsoft sql server creating data definitions ssis packages and complex database objects; mcsd or mcp or mcse or mcitp web applications preferred; microsoft visual studio.net microsoft sql management studio microsoft reporting services and team foundation server; and development of complex etl data transformations using ssis and stored procedures. to apply for city employees please go to employee self service ess click on recruiting activities careers and search for job id #317127. for all other applicants please go to www.nyc.gov jobs go to search for open nyc jobs and click on non employee login to search for job id #317127. do not e mail mail or fax your resume to ddc directly. no phone calls will be accepted. hours shift 35 hours work location 30 30 thomson avenue lic ny residency requirement new york city residency is not required for this position.

natural resources defense council nrdc is the nation's most effective environmental action group combining the power of more than two million members and online activists with the expertise of nearly 500 scientists lawyers policy advocates and other professionals across the globe ensure the rights of all people to the air the water and the wild. nrdc was founded in 1970 and our staff helped write some of america's bedrock environmental laws including the clean water act and many of the implementing regulations; our water enforcement cases played a major role shaping current water policy throughout the country. today our staff – a force for nature work out of offices in new york washington dc chicago los angeles san francisco bozeman montana and beijing. position summary nrdc is seeking a front end web developer with a strong design background to join our digital team. this is a one year position working alongside our in house teams and contractors as necessary to create web products that align with nrdc’s strategic mission and will take an active role in determining how those web products look and function. ideal candidates have experience working with non technical stakeholders ideally as part of an in house team. the ideal candidate should love working in a face paced environment with multiple projects in progress at once. note this is a one year term limited position responsibilities collaborate with in house design editorial and web colleagues as well as with outside vendors to transform ux wireframes into code assist in technical implementation strategies and creating implementation plans design and build engaging advocacy and fundraising forms and campaign pages assist in the design and delivery of standalone campaign websites microsites assist the web team to diagnose and resolve bugs as needed and to prepare for our regular site deployments qualifications proficient understanding of web markup including html5 and css. familiarity with php rails and django experience working in drupal wordpress and other cms platforms proficient understanding of javascript frameworks including jquery. understanding of advanced javascript frameworks such as angularjs and knockoutjs is a plus. basic understanding of server side css pre processing platforms such as sass working knowledge of git and command line tools familiarity with jira assembla or similar project management platforms familiarity with actionkit or a similar crm platform strongly preferred experience working in house and or on a product team is a plus a curiosity and willingness to master new technologies and concepts ability to work both independently and collaboratively across teams and projects strong communications skills especially with multiple stakeholders ability to meet deadlines while working on multiple projects a good sense of humor and the willingness to experiment and innovate. nrdc is committed to workplace diversity and inclusion. we are equal opportunity employers and do not discriminate in hiring or employment on the basis of race color religion national origin gender marital status sexual orientation age disability veteran status or any other characteristic protected by federal state or local law. we offer competitive salaries excellent benefits and a pleasant working environment. salary is based on a nonprofit scale and commensurate with experience. pursuant to the san francisco fair chance ordinance for positions based in san francisco ca we will consider for employment qualified applicants with arrest and conviction records. to apply please visit www.nrdc.org jobs and upload your resume and cover letter through our online portal. please no phone calls emails faxes or in person resume drop offs. please reference where you saw this posting. nrdc is an equal opportunity employer. if you are having technical difficulty while applying please reach out to icims customer care 1 800 889 4422. for further information about nrdc please visit www.nrdc.org

job description please note this position requires a top secret sci ts sci full scope poly clearance. ref 26064 we are seeking a web developer to join our team. the position involves developing web based solutions to capability requirements identified by various program offices. the project also involves refresh opportunities for existing solutions either to update applications to current baseline or leverage existing solutions to increase capabilities. web developers are responsible for day to day site design and creation. web developers are responsible for the technical aspects of the web site including performance issues such as speed of access and for approving site content. qualifications 1. demonstrated experience in a website production and publishing environment. 2. demonstrated experience with asp.net and c#. 3. demonstrated experience with javascript css and html. 4. demonstrated experience developing and querying in relational databases such as ms sql server or mysql. 5. demonstrated experience with sharepoint development. additional information highlight technologies is an equal opportunity employer affirmative action employer.

jacobs technology is the advanced technology division of jacobs engineering one of the nation's largest engineering and technical services only companies. jacobs is the world’s top supplier of automotive test facilities providing a full range of services to commercial automotive industry customers. customers include not only the world’s major vehicle providers and other original equipment manufacturers oems but also clients from the international motorsports community our experience encompasses virtually every type of automotive test facility including climatic and driveability wind tunnels; aerodynamic acoustic and thermodynamic wind tunnels; emissions test rooms; soak rooms; altitude chambers; engine and powertrain test cells; and electromagnetic anechoic chambers. we not only design and build these facility systems assets but also operate maintain and manage these facilities. as a programmer web developer you would provide programming support in the development of online systems to improve the efficiency of managerial tasks and the organization of data within a test laboratory environment. you would be responsible for delivering and supporting information technology services by developing testing implementing and maintaining web based application systems. application uptime is maximized through continuous monitoring of potential failure modes and feedback from end users. participation with colleagues to troubleshoot reported web based application problems and issues is required. tasked with looking for ways to improve existing applications i.e. decreasing application load computing times integrate new functionality etc. and develop new applications that perform tasks which previously were performed manually. they apply knowledge in a variety of client and server side programming languages i.e. javascript sql php etc. to produce efficient web interfaces for a variety of users technicians engineers and managers. relies on experience and judgment to plan and accomplish goals. a wide degree of creativity resourcefulness self motivation and versatility is required. the online systems are constantly being evolved to improve computing times and increase user friendly aspects by incorporate newly released features. most of these features are used via jquery plug ins and custom user interfaces aimed at optimizing monitor screen space and displaying only the information the user needs to see to accomplish their specific objective. qualifications

overview workwave is seeking a full stack web developer who is ready to step into a leadership position within our collaborative and data driven team based in holmdel new jersey. this individual should be deeply passionate about web development and the quality of the code and technologies that they implement. responsibilities you’ll play a key role on our marketing team specifically you'll be responsible for lead the technical execution of our web growth strategy spanning web products data analytics testing and automation lead the development and testing of new marketing mobile apps to support the solution set own web development projects from backend to the presentation layer own the deployment process manage continuous integration and deployment workflow develop and maintain new features oversee and maintain our content management system solve problems as they arise and as we scale up our business manage back end integration of marketo and other marketing technologies with the website contribute to the technical development of web developers on your team work with various internal teams to integrate new and existing company products build out our modern web architecture to enable us to operate more quickly and at scale develop and maintain our web framework to serve the needs of the marketing team work through a variety of technical challenges that will require creativity and close collaboration across internal functions. qualifications 4 years’ experience in a similar role 2 3 years’ experience as a team lead strong programming experience strong vanilla javascript including es6+ skills .net implementation and development experience is required experience developing for sitecore episerver or other .net cms a plus strong php skills and familiarity with object oriented programming concepts drupal or joomla experience preferred strong html css skills knowledgeable in css preprocessors familiar with apache nginx iis familiar with windows server linux familiar with relational databases such as mysql familiar with the node.js ecosystem and npm familiar with git and version control systems familiar with http restful apis and oauth strong collaborator and individual contributor able to mentor junior members on best practices a bachelor’s degree in computer science or a related discipline is required. we'd like you to know that "fit" is the most important criteria for us when hiring. we can always find good technical individuals but finding ones who share our values is absolutely critical. for us and for you when folks share values they look forward to coming to work and spending time with their co workers in delivering solutions for our customers. to “fit” at workwave you must be intellectually curious and passionate you love figuring out what the problem is and finding a way to fix it. you enjoy coming to work each day and have a positive energy that the organization can see and feel. empathetic and respectful you truly appreciate other’s perspectives. you put yourself in others shoes and go out of your way to ensure that all perspectives are heard and understood before decisions are taken team player you’re willing to jump in and help whenever and wherever needed by the team. your goal is to find ways to provide value rather than call attention to your individual performance get things done once you’ve determined the key elements of the problem you solve it and figure out how to most effectively put that solution in place. you’re not afraid to roll up your sleeves take responsibility and make things happen as an individual contributor but also know how to drive your team to do the same. once you start them you like to finish things not just “checking the box” but making sure that they get done and done right. willing to make mistakes and intellectually honest when you do you are not afraid to make mistakes and when you do you admit them learn from them and ensure they don’t get repeated in the future. placing blame and spending time pointing fingers is not part of your dna. why work for workwave voted one of the best places to work in new jersey workwave is unique in that it has a large established base of loyal customers but also has enormous growth opportunities in multiple areas. we are transforming the field service industry one customer at a time by building intuitive best in class cloud based software mobile apps and high value services that solve key pain points our customers face every day allowing them to save money save time and improve customer service levels all at the same time. to do this we focus on 3 simple things 1 hiring and developing great people 2 building great products quickly and 3 turning customers and employees into raving fans. we’re looking for individuals that are passionate about and can help us deliver on those 3 simple but hard to achieve tenets. work here...wave hello to a job you’ll love this position is based at our home office in the historic bell works complex located in holmdel township new jersey. we offer a robust benefits package including health and dental paid time off a 401k with company match and a great environment filled with energetic fun team oriented people. most importantly at workwave there is such a thing as free lunch. by bringing in lunch from local businesses monday through thursday for our entire nj staff we support local business and offer a great perk all at the same time. on fridays we encourage employees to take advantage of the hour lunch break away from their desks and explore what the bell works “metro burb” has to offer

sources. responsibilities are primarily but not exclusively web based including potentially other forms of application development. principal duties involve front end development and deployment; web and graphics design; user experience ux design and evaluation; creation of user oriented documentation; and participation in outreach and training activities. duties also include configuration and development for common content management systems such as drupal or wordpress; programming with web related technologies such as html css javascript e.g. jquery d3 json and xml; and use of graphics we are looking for an outstanding web developer to be responsible for the coding and maintenance of ijm canada’s website and online donation platforms which includes online giving peer to peer fundraising and gift catalogue. responsibilities lead the development and maintenance of the ijm canada website with a focus on user interface and user experience and converting online leads to online donations. this includes but is not limited to create sitemaps screen flows and webpages; provide guidance for wireframes; optimize website for mobile; implement seo google analytics and google campaigns; on an ongoing basis conduct usability testing to ensure an exceptional experience for back end users and front end consumers; and trouble shoot and solve weaknesses in website cms. create maintain and consistently improve the technological capabilities of ijm canada’s current online giving platforms online donation peer to peer fundraising and gift catalogue. this includes but is not limited to integrate online giving platforms with ijm canada website; trouble shoot and fix issues for all giving platforms; and optimize user interface for all giving platforms. other manage accessibility requirements for website and other available content. ensure seamless integration of marketing automation platform with ijm canada website and database ie – mailchimp etc. . work cross departmentally to ensure integration of team needs across all platforms. required skills and experience bsc or diploma in computer science web development or related field; 1 to 2 years relevant work experience experience acquired through internships will be considered ; strong working knowledge of programming languages such as html css javascript and apis; proven ability to optimize web experiences for mobile; proven ability to work with marketing automation platforms such as mailchimp; proven ability to implement google analytics google campaigns seo and new emerging data generation tools; experience with web user interface ui user experience ux design; experience integrating data from various back end services and databases such as blackbaud and salesforce; proven ability leading successful web development projects; and proven ability with implementation and management of online giving platforms ie.salesforce blackbaud netcommunity . critical qualities humble and resilient; pursues excellence; culturally aware and appreciative of differences; strong service ethic; innovative problem solver; ability to build trust and strong partnerships with others; courageous in pursuing opportunities and challenges; tenacious in achieving goals; and professional. organization information ijm canada offers a competitive salary with medical dental and retirement benefits. position reports to the manager of marketing & communications. position based at ijm canada headquarters in london ontario. applications accepted until the position is filled – target start date december 2017. submit resume cover letter & statement of faith in one document to applications@ijm.ca what is a statement of faith a statement of faith should describe your christian faith and how you see it as relevant to your involvement with ijm. the statement can either be incorporated into the cover letter or submitted as a separate document and should include at a minimum a description of your spiritual disciplines prayer study etc. and your current fellowship or place of worship.

about us national merchants association is america's only business advocacy group working for small business owners to eliminate the unnecessary and unreasonable fees that some credit card processors charge. national merchants association is nationally recognized for its ingenuity and reputation as a leader in the electronic payments industry. the work environment at national merchants association is built around the belief of growth beyond boundaries. as an employee you'll understand how your work fits into the whole. you'll feel good about coming to work; about the contributions you make to our clients fellow employees and the company. we believe in helping employees do more with more… more open communication. more teamwork. more challenges. summary objective national merchants association is launching a dedicated agency to oversee all marketing projects across our company. to ensure our agency operates at peak efficiency we’re seeking an experienced web developer who will be responsible for programming monitoring and updating nma websites and digital platforms as well as all external clients using wordpress html css and other web development tools and applications. the web developer will also assist the marketing directors and creative director in daily creative deliverables including email campaigns marketing campaigns digital submission forms splash pages microsites and more. essential functions expert in wordpress development theming plugins post types meta shortcodes loops functions and structures ability to modify existing sites with html css js and php experience building custom wordpress themes from the ground up fluency in php css javascript jquery front end libraries bootstrap foundation experience with large scale media properties mysql or other relational database performance and scaling production deployment experience comfortable with a b testing test automation and other engineering best practices ability to translate wireframes and sketch photoshop mockups into responsive sites across devices screens knowledge of web hosting environment and management of several sites and installs experience with setup modification maintenance and migration for dns and databases experience with javascript frameworks vuejs react angular etc mindful of clean documented code with attention to detail optimized speed & performance. ability to manage multiple projects and deliver on schedule in a fast paced environment be a great communicator embrace a collaborative work style possess strong leadership skills and have an ability to write technical documentation education and experience at least 3 years experience with html css javascript and php at least 3 years experience with wordpress custom wp themes and wp plug ins and ecommerce development knowledge of google analytics & google tag manager knowledge of adobe creative suite exposure to marketing advertising pr or media a plus experience with project management software asana is used in our agency – experience with teamwork is preferred but not required proficient with microsoft office word excel powerpoint strong decision making skills and a results driven approach must have excellent time management delegation and conflict management abilities supervisory responsibility this position has no supervisory responsibilities but does serve as a coach and mentor for other positions in the organization. travel less than 5% work environment this job operates in a clerical office setting. this role routinely uses standard office equipment such as computers phones photocopiers filing cabinets and fax machines . physical demands this would require the ability to lift files open filing cabinets and bend or stand on a stool as necessary. must possess mobility to work in a standard office setting and to use standard office equipment including a computer stamina to maintain attention to detail despite interruptions strength to lift and carry files weighing up to 10 pounds; vision to read printed materials and a computer screen and hearing and speech to communicate in person and over the telephone. it is the policy of national merchants association to provide equal employment opportunities to all applicants without regard to race color creed religion sex gender gender identity and or expression national origin or citizenship age ancestry sexual orientation physical or mental disability medical condition genetic information marital status registered domestic partner status military or veteran status or any other characteristic protected by federal state or local law. this policy applies to all terms and conditions of employment including recruiting hiring placement promotion termination layoff transfer leaves of absence and compensation. in addition national merchants association will provide reasonable accommodations for qualified individuals with disabilities. national merchants association will not sponsor applicants for work visas.
